subject: add section on coverage tools?
msgSnippet: Tom Roche 09/01/2005 08:28 PM ... Kent Beck Mon, 5 Sep 2005 11:33:33 -0700 ... Perhaps then http://www.junit.org/news/extension/index.htm could get a section
messageBody:
Tom Roche 09/01/2005 08:28 PM
>> Apologies if this is OT, but IMHO coverage measurement (for guiding
>> one's test writing) and IDEs (for writing and running one's tests)
>> are both at least tangentially related to JUnit ...

Kent Beck Mon, 5 Sep 2005 11:33:33 -0700
> I don't think this coverage is off-topic at all, since the coverage
> testers I've tried all use JUnit tests to initiate execution of the
> code.

Perhaps then

http://www.junit.org/news/extension/index.htm

could get a section for coverage tools? There is already a large
amount of information available in the thread under

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/14581

but it could be better organized and have more non-Eclipse,
JUnit-based coverage tools included (there are already several
mentioned in the thread).
